00172     class FloatingPointPrecision {
00173     public:
00174 
00175         static Real Epsilon() {
00176             // smallest number such that 1+Eps!=Eps
00177             return pow(2.0,1-FSIGNIF);
00178         }
00179 
00180         static Real Maximum() {
00181             // maximum value
00182             return MAXFLOAT;
00183         }
